instruction: Compare the similarities between two recent smartphone models.
input: iPhone 11 Pro and Samsung Galaxy S20
output: The iPhone 11 Pro and the Samsung Galaxy S20 are two of the most popular smartphones on the market. Both phones have an almost identical aesthetic design and similar display sizes, but there are several notable differences. The iPhone 11 Pro has a triple rear camera setup and an OLED screen, while the Samsung has a quad lens array and an AMOLED screen. Additionally, the iPhone has a longer battery life, while the Galaxy offers a faster processor and more RAM.
